Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: Art Laffer and Stephen Moore have written a GREAT new Book, “THE TRUMP ECONOMIC MIRACLE: AND THE PLAN TO UNLEASH PROSPERITY AGAIN.” In my first term, we cut Taxes and Regulations at record levels, had virtually No Inflation, Record Job Numbers, the Lowest Unemployment Rates for ALL, and the Greatest Period of Economic Growth that our Country has ever seen. During this Harris-Biden “interlude,” we have experienced the true danger of Radical Left Policies that are driving up prices, and hurting families across our Nation but, never fear. Together, we will MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN - THE BEST IS YET TO COME! https://www.amazon.com/Trump-Economic-Miracle-Unleash-Prosperity/dp/B0DHWHBXSJ?dplnkId=5079b737-f438-4324-9701-3c6dd2cbba94&nodl=1
